entry.title: AstroXTeam/Quantava: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building ‚Äî all in a lightweight package.
entry.content: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building ‚Äî all in a lightweight package.

entry.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility
entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
entry.content: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
